title: Process for Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Using Situated Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts and experiencing problem-solving strategies
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations, emphasizing problem-solving abilities for non-repetitive issues in real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various math problem types (including non-repetitive problems) according to situational contexts and develop solution strategies.
Learners can evaluate and improve their problem-solving processes through a personalized feedback system.
Learners demonstrate the ability to solve real-life problems through mathematical approaches using VR simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
